verses.name: 2 Kings 4:10
verses.text: Let us make a little chamber, I pray thee, on the wall; and let us set for him there a bed, and a table, and a stool, and a candlestick: and it shall be, when he cometh to us, that he shall turn in thither.

verses.name: 2 Kings 4:11
verses.text: And it fell on a day, that he came thither, and he turned into the chamber, and lay there.

verses.name: 2 Kings 4:12
verses.text: And he said to Gehazi his servant, Call this Shunammite. And when he had called her, she stood before him.
